entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
